name: European Cultural and Creative Industries Alliance
goal: ECCIA is composed of the five major European Cultural and Creative Luxury Industry associations: Circulo Fortuny (SP), Comit√© Colbert (FR), Fondazione Altagamma (IT), Walpole (UK) and Meisterkreis (DE). Its members represent together approximately 300 of Europe's leading luxury brands covering 14 different high-end product and service markets. The aim of ECCIA is to promote the interest of the European high-end industries towards the European Institutions.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Digital Single Market strategy
EU Single Market Strategy
Market access (including ongoing FTA negotiations)
Vertical restrictions and related guidelines (selective distribution)
Intellectual property (trademarks, customs enforcement, IPRED, trade secrets, illegal content online, ...)
